subject: Tennis
China Open (Tennis)
Talladega Superspeedway
lead_paragraph: A view of the day in sports, in which American Olympic track athletes competed in the bobsled and a dog ran off with Paul Casey’s golf ball at the Alfred Dunhill Links Championship in Scotland.
snippet: A view of the day in sports, in which American Olympic track athletes competed in the bobsled and a dog ran off with Paul Casey’s golf ball at the Alfred Dunhill Links Championship in Scotland.
